item.title: Bob Dylan - Knockin' On Heaven's Door - Key of G - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Knockin' On Heaven's Door by Bob Dylan from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, G.

item.title: Simon and Garfunkel - The Sound Of Silence - Key of Em - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song The Sound Of Silence by Simon and Garfunkel from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, Esus2, G.

item.title: The Hound & The Fox - You Are My Sunshine - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song You Are My Sunshine by The Hound & The Fox from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, D, G.

item.title: Bella Ciao (Ukulele Fingerstyle Play Along) Tabs On Screen - Ukulele Cheats

item.description: Play along video for the song Ging Gang Gooli by Melinda Caroll from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, C7, F, G7.

item.title: Dennis Kamakahi - Wahine ‘Ilikea - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Wahine ‘Ilikea by Dennis Kamakahi from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Bm7, Cmaj7, D, G7, Gmaj7.

item.title: Mary Chapin Carpenter - Thanksgiving Song - Key of G - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song Thanksgiving Song by Mary Chapin Carpenter from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Em, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song You Gotta Sing by Nancy Cassidy from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, Dm, E7.

item.title: Ledward Ka'apana - I Kona - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Kona by Ledward Ka'apana from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B, B♭, C, Csus4, D7, G7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Scarborough Fair / Canticle by Simon & Garfunkel from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, D, Em, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Guava Jam by Ka’au Crater Boys from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A♭, C, C7, D7, F, G7, Gsus4.
